articles.title: No 10 plans to curb the power of Netflix and Amazon to give BBC and ITV a chance to compete - Daily Mail
articles.description: Under Downing Street proposals to be published this week, media regulator Ofcom would exercise the same authority over on-demand services as its does over traditional broadcasters.
articles.content:
Downing Street plans to curb the power of streaming giants such as Netflix, Disney and Amazon Prime by forcing them to be subject to British regulation for the first time.
